title: BoxDimensions
description: The width, depth, and height of a box.

cartesian.description: The dimensions specified as a three-dimensional Cartesian value `[X, Y, Z]`, with X representing width, Y representing depth, and Z representing height, in world coordinates in meters.

reference.description: The dimensions specified as a reference to another property.

delete.description: Whether the client should delete existing samples or interval data for this property. Data will be deleted for the containing interval, or if there is no containing interval, then all data. If true, all other properties in this property will be ignored.
